title: Perform post-upgrade tasks as the tenant admin
content:
To accommodate new and updated capabilities that are part of the current release, a tenant admin needs to review the following tasks, which are grouped into the following categories: 

  • Critical tasks: mandatory tasks that you must perform as soon as possible to ensure the uninterrupted functionality of the solution. Neglecting these tasks may have adverse effects on its proper operation.
  • Essential tasks: mandatory tasks that you need to perform soon after this version update. 
  • Enhancement tasks: tasks that you need to perform before the next version update, if applicable and relevant. If not applicable or relevant, you can skip them. 
To use certain new features or enhancements in an upgraded environment, the tenant admin may need to edit forms and apply business rule changes from Studio in the agent interface (Administration > Configuration > Studio). For detailed instructions, see Edit a form and Configuration comparison. 

Critical tasks

The following is a list of critical tasks. See the beginning section of this topic for the definition of a critical task.

    OPB Agent upgrade

    Your OPB agent is automatically upgraded during each update. After each update, make sure your existing OPB agent can connect to the system successfully so that your OPB-based integrations can continue to work. If not, see OPB doesn't work after an upgrade for troubleshooting instructions. 

    External OO RAS and OO Workflow Designer upgrade

    Perform this task only if you're using OO Containerized. 

    If you don't upgrade your external OO RAS, OO flows will fail to run; if you skip the Workflow Designer upgrade, you might encounter some remote debugging issues. 

    After the upgrade of OO Containerized and the suite, you need to upgrade the external OO RAS and OO Workflow Designer. 

    1. Log in to the agent portal as the tenant admin.
    2. Navigate to Administration > Utilities > Integration, click Agents on the top of the screen, and then select Endpoints from the list. The OPB download center opens on the right-side pane. 
    3. In the Operations Orchestration section of the download center, download the upgrade packages of the OO RAS and OO Workflow Designer.
    4. Upgrade OO RAS and OO Workflow Designer. See Upgrade the OO components. 

    Essential tasks

    Regenerate non-expiring PATs

    Starting with release 25.4, personal access tokens (PATs) must have an expiration duration to ensure secure deployments. If you have any non-expiring PATs, we strongly recommend regenerating them.
    • To regenerate listener PAT, see, the section on Regenerate an expired token in Listener.
    • To regenerate service portal PAT, see the section on Generate personal access tokens from Service Portal in Use OData for BI integration.

    Enhancement tasks

    There are no enhancement tasks in this release. See the beginning section of this topic for the definition of an enhancement task.
